articles.author: Matt Walsh
articles.title: Jannik Sinner wins Australian Open, claims first major title - ESPN - ESPN India
articles.description: Jannik Sinner rallied past Daniil Medvedev in five sets to win the Australian Open and claim his first Grand Slam title.
articles.content:
MELBOURNE, Australia -- Jannik Sinner pulled off a remarkable comeback from two sets down to defeat Daniil Medvedev 3-6, 3-6, 6-4, 6-4, 6-3 in the Australian Open men's final Sunday.
The fourth-seed… [+5382 chars]
